lead_paragraph: An article on Monday about the core of young players on the Los Angeles Dodgers — Russell Martin, Matt Kemp, James Loney and Andre Ethier — who are being counted on during the 50-game suspension of their veteran teammate Manny Ramirez, referred incorrectly to Ethier’s career background. He joined the Dodgers’ minor league system through a trade in 2005 with the Oakland A’s; he did not rise through the Dodgers’ farm system as did the other three players.
